title: Predicting Flight Delays Using Apache APIS: Kafka, Spark and Drill

courses.title: Predicting Flight Delays Using Apache APIS: Kafka, Spark and Drill
courses.description: In this deep dive we will look at the architecture of a data pipeline that combines streaming data with machine learning to predict flight delays. You will see the end-to-end process required to build this application using Apache APIs for Kafka, Spark, Drill and other technologies
